title: @Riot, can we get a few weeks without Featured Gamemodes?
body: I feel like it does some real damage to queues. Queue times go right up, game quality drops, and I feel like there's even a residual effect during the week of players being generally worse at the game due to the altered game mechanics and overall gameflow in the other modes.

replies.body:
Honestly all of league is a shit show at the moment.

I can barely motivate myself to play.
